name: Glitchant
description:
Glitchant is a glitchful sandbox 2D action game supports online multiplayer.

STORY

This is Memoria, a world within RAM.

Magicians called Glitcians live in this world.

Memoria is made up of tiles.
Using magic to cause glitches, Glitcians turn the land into useful tiles.

These mysterious tiles are used by Glitcians both for casting spells
and as materials to create magical items.

For a long time, Glitcians used their magic to create glitches
over and over, without a care...

Until one day, suddenly, a black dragon appeared!
Apparently Glitcian magic seemed to be the cause...

“You are the ones who have awakened me, aren't you?
My name is NIGHT’MARE, I had long been sealed in an unused address.
I HATE THIS WORLD. I SHALL RETURN IT TO THE SEA OF CHAOS!”

And with that, the Memoryquake began.
Memoria's tiles are being rewritten at random, one after another...

“We must stop him and restore peace to our world!”
